subject_terms_3: Photography Orchard Road Presbyterian Church (Place) Churches Christianity
physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a church. The church has a cupola as well as tiled pitched roofs. A porch is supported by double columns and it contains an arched opening at its centre. There are a couple of tall trees in front of the church. The foreground shows a street andd a pavement as someone walks by.
title_text: St. Andrew's Club / Orchard Road Presbyterian Church Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
